00011 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00012    FUNCTION: wn_shell()
00013     PURPOSE: Calls operating system shell with a command
00014      SYNTAX: wn_shell(int wait, char *command);
00015 DESCRIPTION: Creates a full-sized window and performs the given command.
00016     RETURNS: Nothing
00017     VERSION: 920224 V0.1
00018 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00019 void wn_shell(char *command)
00020 {
00021   WINDOW *OS_window;
00022 
00023   OS_window = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
00024                       _desktop_att,_desktop_att);
00025   wn_clear(OS_window);
00026   v_cursoron();
00027   printf("Return to simulation program with 'exit' ...\n\n");
00028 
00029   /*  MUST USE SPAWN IN THE FUTURE */
00030 
00031   system(command);
00032   OS_window = wn_close(OS_window);
00033 }
